attributes.review: Never will load, sends me tons of notifications, and then they aren’t there when I open the app! If this is the best Donald Trump can do for an app I definitely don’t want him as president!!
attributes.title: Worst app ever!

attributes.review: I really did not like this app I don’t know why it’s still in the store because it was just a waste of storage it was not helpful and overall who would wanna vote for Donald trump
attributes.title: Donald trump app

attributes.review: This app took weeks to download and was lagging all the time. If you’re gonna make an app make sure it has good quality or else don’t make it at all
attributes.title: Worst app ever

attributes.review: Worst restaurant I’ve ever been to. If I could give it 0 stars I would😡😤. I found roaches in my salad and there was an infestation of rats in the bathroom. Someone needs to shut this place down🤬😠
attributes.title: Horrible restaurant😤😡

attributes.review: I got this app and it was absolutely awful I couldn’t believe my eyes the big ugly orange doesn’t know what he’s doing he’s not going down without a fight if he deletes tik Tok we delete him!! Periodt love, Barron trump 👁👅👁
attributes.title: Terrible app

attributes.review: The day after installing the app, Russian spyware and spam flooded my phone and hacked my Facebook. My phone screen then turned orange and turned off for good. I had to purchase a new phone. THANKS A LOT.
attributes.title: Russian propaganda spam DO NOT DOWNLOAD

attributes.review: Worst app every it has taken 2 months to download and I have the iPhone 8 do not download it a giant waste of time along with the past 4 years
attributes.title: Go away

attributes.review: Took hours to download on high speed WiFi and even still the app would not open. Do not download any all costs
attributes.title: Awful app

attributes.review: The most horrible app ever. I went on this app to see if Trump’s hair is real. It just just brought me to a bunch of political news stuff. That’s boring🤢🤮. How about you put some real news on the app!?!?!
Terrible app, made my phone glitch and I had to reset my phone. Also only provides fake news. I would never download this app if i were you
attributes.title: TERRIBLE APP
